title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: Bug 102436: Date/time value is not stored correctly in the report design. An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When a DateTime type report parameter is created in the BIRT report designer, and an invalid date string (e.g. '55/66/9999') is entered in the 'default value' field.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated either by the UI or the Model, and the invalid date string should have been rejected or displayed an error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report parameter of type DateTime.
3. In the 'default value' field, enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999'.
